contentList.content: The target's skin becomes tough, with a consistency like bark or wood. The target gains <LSTag Tooltip="Resistance">resistance</LSTag> [1] to bludgeoning and piercing damage and <LSTag Tooltip="Weakness">weakness</LSTag> [2] to fire.
Life energy shuts death's door. The target loses the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOWNED">Downed</LSTag> condition.

Touch a creature and negate any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLEEING">Fleeing</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUPEFIED">Stupefied</LSTag> conditions afflicting it.

Touch a creature and negate any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLEEING">Fleeing</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUPEFIED">Stupefied</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSED">Confused</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLOWED">Slowed</LSTag> conditions afflicting it.

Touch a creature and negate any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blind</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZZLED">Dazzled</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENFEEBLED">Enfeebled</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SICKENED">Sickened</LSTag> condition afflicting it.

Touch a creature and negate any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blind</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZZLED">Dazzled</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENFEEBLED">Enfeebled</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SICKENED">Sickened</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLOWED">Slowed</LSTag> condition afflicting it.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> this turn.
Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane lock.
Summon a flaming shield that wreathes your body in flames. It sheds light in a [1] radius, provides <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Cold damage, and retaliates against melee attacks.
Summon a flaming shield that wreathes your body in flames. It sheds light in a [1] radius, provides <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Cold damage, and retaliates against melee attacks.
Raise a wall of non-magical, solid stone.
Create a wall of pliable, twisted thorns surrounded by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENSNARED_VINES">Entangling</LSTag> vines.
Creatures can move through the wall, but they take [1] per turn, and their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is quartered.

Wreathed in scorching flames.

Affected entity sheds light in a [2] radius, has Resistance to Cold damage, and deals [1] to anyone who hits it with a melee attack.

Wreathed in scorching flames.

Affected entity sheds light in a [2] radius, has Resistance to Cold damage, and deals [1] to anyone who hits it with a melee attack.
Channel a powerful electric current through the metal of a weapon, zapping anyone the item hits. The target becomes a +[1] shock weapon.

A feral aspect overcomes the target, filling them with strength and ferocity. They gain 5 temporary Hit Points, a +10-foot bonus to their speed, and weakness 5 to silver. They also grow vicious fangs and claws, which are unarmed attacks that cause 1d4 persistent bleed damage on a critical hit.
You have tempoary hit points for 1 round.
Your teeth have grown into vicious fangs. Bite to deal [1]d8 piercing damage, inflicting Bleed on a critical hit.
Your nails have grown into vicious claws. Swipe to deal [1]d6 slashing damage, inflicting Bleed on a critical hit.

A feral aspect overcomes your targets, filling them with strength and ferocity. Targets gain [1] temporary Hit Points, a +10-foot status bonus to their speed, and weakness [2] to silver. They also grow vicious fangs and claws, which are unarmed attacks. These attacks can inflict bleeding on a critical hit.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Area 10-foot burst
Defense Reflex
A brilliant and clamorous display of sparks and colorful fireworks explode around your enemies, dealing 1d8 fire damage and 1d8 sonic damage to creatures within a 10-foot burst. All creatures in the area must attempt a Reflex save.
Heightened (+2) The initial fire damage increases by 1d8, the sonic damage increases by 1d8, and the persistent fire damage a creature takes on a critical failure increases by 1d4.

2 Actions
Range 1d20 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense basic Reflex
You call down a tendril of lightning that cracks with thunder, dealing 1d12 electricity damage and 1d4 sonic damage to the target with a basic Reflex save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12 electricity and 1d4 sonic.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Area 10-foot burst
Defense Reflex
A brilliant and clamorous display of sparks and colorful fireworks explode around your enemies, dealing 1d8 fire damage and 1d8 sonic damage to creatures within a 10-foot burst. All creatures in the area must attempt a Reflex save.
Heightened (+2) The initial fire damage increases by 1d8, the sonic damage increases by 1d8, and the persistent fire damage a creature takes on a critical failure increases by 1d4.

Range 30 feet
Defense Fortitude
You prove that slow and steady doesn't always win the race by turning a foe into a proverbial tortoise and yourself or an ally into a hare, siphoning some of the foe's speed and granting it to the other target. The effects depend on the foe's Fortitude save.
Critical Success The targets are unaffected.
Success The foe is slowed 1 for 1 round, and the other target is unaffected.
Failure The foe is slowed 1 for 3 rounds and the other target is quickened for 1 round. It can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.
Critical Failure The foe is slowed 1 for 3 minutes and the other target is quickened for 1 minute. It can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Range 30 feet
Hasten an ally for 1 round.

Range 30 feet
Hasten an ally for 1 minute.
You have stolen the speed of an enemy, and may use your next action to grant it to an ally.
The target has had its speed stolen, inflicting the Stunned condition.
The target has had its speed stolen, inflicting the Stunned condition.
This creature has had a portion of it's speed stolen from it, reducing the number of actions it can use by [1]
This creature is tethered to the material plane, and cannot teleport or use teleportation effects.

Range 30 feet
Defense Will
You stitch the target to its current plane. While the target is affected by planar tether, the spell prevents any teleportation effect that would move the target, or any effect that would transport it to a different plane. Planar tether's duration is determined by the target's Will save.
Critical Success The targets are unaffected.
Success The duration is 1 minute.
Failure The duration is 10 minutes.
Critical Failure The duration is 1 hour.
Resource used exclusively to prevent spells from being cast. It is never actually granted, only given as a use cost.

Range 30 feet
Area 5-foot burst
Defense Reflex
Water blasts upward, coming out of the ground, rising from a pool, or even manifesting from thin air. Any creatures in the area take 2d4 bludgeoning damage, with a basic Reflex saving throw. A creature that critically fails its save is disoriented by the explosion of water, becoming off-guard until the end of your next turn.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Area 30-foot Cone
Defense Reflex
You swing a weapon you're holding, and the weapon magically multiplies into duplicates that swipe at all creatures in either a cone or an emanation.
Critical Success: The creature is unaffected.
Success: The target takes half damage.
Failure: The target takes full damage.
Critical Failure: The target takes double damage and is subject to the weapon's critical specialization effect.
Heightened (+1): Add another damage die.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Area 30-foot Cone
Defense Reflex
You swing a weapon you're holding, and the weapon magically multiplies into duplicates that swipe at all creatures in either a cone or an emanation.
Critical Success: The creature is unaffected.
Success: The target takes half damage.
Failure: The target takes full damage.
Critical Failure: The target takes double damage and is subject to the weapon's critical specialization effect.
Heightened (+1): Add another damage die.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Area 30-foot Cone
Defense Reflex
You swing a weapon you're holding, and the weapon magically multiplies into duplicates that swipe at all creatures in either a cone or an emanation.
Critical Success: The creature is unaffected.
Success: The target takes half damage.
Failure: The target takes full damage.
Critical Failure: The target takes double damage and is subject to the weapon's critical specialization effect.
Heightened (+1): Add another damage die.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Area 30-foot Cone
Defense Reflex
You swing a weapon you're holding, and the weapon magically multiplies into duplicates that swipe at all creatures in either a cone or an emanation.
Critical Success: The creature is unaffected.
Success: The target takes half damage.
Failure: The target takes full damage.
Critical Failure: The target takes double damage and is subject to the weapon's critical specialization effect.
Heightened (+1): Add another damage die.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Area 30-foot Cone
Defense Reflex
You swing a weapon you're holding, and the weapon magically multiplies into duplicates that swipe at all creatures in either a cone or an emanation.
Critical Success: The creature is unaffected.
Success: The target takes half damage.
Failure: The target takes full damage.
Critical Failure: The target takes double damage and is subject to the weapon's critical specialization effect.
Heightened (+1): Add another damage die.
Teleport yourself and up to one ally back to the Submersible.

You instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to an unoccupied space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you—even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container—the spell is lost.

Teleport yourself and a target to a nearby location, shredding the target's mind, and leaving behind an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CreateIllusion_DisplacerBeast">Illusory Copy</LSTag> of yourself.

You teleport the targets to new positions within the area. The creatures must each be able to fit in their new space, and their positions must be unoccupied, entirely within the area, and in your line of sight. Unwilling creatures can attempt a Will save.

You teleport the targets to new positions within the area. The creatures must each be able to fit in their new space, and their positions must be unoccupied, entirely within the area, and in your line of sight. Unwilling creatures can attempt a Will save.
The target may choose a location to teleport to.
Choose a location to teleport your selected target(s) to.
The target will be teleported to a location of your choosing.
This creature is levitating, making them immune to ground based surfaces. The imbalance from being in the air has given it a -[1] penalty to attacks.

Range Touch
You defy gravity and levitate the target 5 feet off the ground, making it immune to ground surfaces. A creature floating in the air from levitate takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls. A floating creature can spend an Interact action to stabilize itself and negate this penalty for the remainder of its turn.
Steady yourself in the air, temporarily returning your attack bonus to normal.
This creature has steadied itself while levitating, removing the -[1] penalty to attacks.

Enclosed in an arcane sphere.

Affected entity is impervious to all spell effects and damage, and cannot move, cast spells, or deal damage until the sphere is destroyed.

Enclosed in an arcane sphere.

Affected entity is impervious to all spell effects and damage, and cannot move, cast spells, or deal damage until the sphere is destroyed.

Enclosed in an arcane sphere.

Affected entity is impervious to all spell effects and damage, and cannot cast spells or deal damage. Movement speed halved.

Enclosed in an arcane sphere.

Affected entity is impervious to all spell effects and damage, and cannot move, cast spells, or deal damage until the sphere is destroyed.

Enclosed in an arcane sphere.

Affected entity is impervious to all spell effects and damage, and cannot move, cast spells, or deal damage until the sphere is destroyed.

Enclosed in an arcane sphere.

Affected entity is impervious to all spell effects and damage, and cannot move, cast spells, or deal damage until the sphere is destroyed.

Enclosed in an arcane sphere.

Affected entity is impervious to all spell effects and damage, and cannot move, cast spells, or deal damage until the sphere is destroyed.

Enclose a target in a sphere of shimmering force.
Defense Reflex
Affected entity is impervious to all spell effects and damage, and cannot cast spells, deal damage, or move..

You move the targeted object up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair. When you Sustain the spell, you can do so again without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>, or you can shift your telekinetic focus to a different eligible target within range, moving it instead.
You move the targeted object up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.

2 Actions
Range 120 Feet
Target 1 unattended object
You move the targeted object up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair. When you Sustain the spell, you can do so again without expending a spell slot, or you can shift your telekinetic focus to a different eligible target within range, moving it instead.

1 Action
Range 120 Feet
Target 1 unattended object
You move the targeted object up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair without expending a spell slot.
Once per turn, the affected entity can telekinetically throw an object again without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.

2 Actions
Range 120 Feet
Target 1 unattended object
You move the targeted object up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair. When you Sustain the spell, you can do so again without expending a spell slot, or you can shift your telekinetic focus to a different eligible target within range, moving it instead.

Range Touch
Targets 1 Willing Creature
The target's skin becomes tough, with a consistency like bark or wood. The target gains resistance [1] to bludgeoning and piercing damage and weakness [2] to fire.
Heightened (+2) The resistances increase by 2, and the weakness increases by 3.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against True Strike's target.
The spellcaster has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against this creature.

Range 60 feet
Defense AC
With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. You can attempt to Disarm the target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check.

Range 60 feet
Defense AC
With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. You can attempt to Trip the target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check.

Range 60 feet
Defense AC
With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. You can attempt to Disarm, Reposition, Shove, or Trip the target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check.

Range 60 feet
Defense AC
With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. You can attempt to Shove the target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check.

2 Actions
Area 5-foot Emanation
Saving throw basic Reflex
Wind flows from your outstretched hands and whirls around you in a 5-foot emanation. Each creature in the area takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage, with a Fortitude save.

You teleport the targets to new positions within the area. The creatures must each be able to fit in their new space, and their positions must be unoccupied, entirely within the area, and in your line of sight. Unwilling creatures can attempt a Will save.

Range Varies
Defense Fortitude
Gathering kinetic energy, you either focus it in a straight line or disperse it as an encircling ripple. Any creature targeted by this spell must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from you (or 20 feet on a critical failure). The spell's area or range and how many creatures it affects is based on how many actions you spend when Casting the Spell.

Range 15 feet
Defense Fortitude
Gathering kinetic energy, you either focus it at one creature within 15 feet. Any creature targeted by this spell must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from you (or 20 feet on a critical failure).

Range 30 feet
Defense Fortitude
Gathering kinetic energy, you either focus it at one creature within 30 feet. Any creature targeted by this spell must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or be pushed 20 feet away from you. Targets are pushed 40 feet on a critical failure, knocked prone, and takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage.

Range 5 feet
Defense Fortitude
Gathering kinetic energy, you either focus it all creatures within 5 feet. Any creature targeted by this spell must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or be pushed 20 feet away from you. Targets are pushed 40 feet on a critical failure, knocked prone, and take 1d6 bludgeoning damage.

Range 5 feet
Defense Fortitude
Gathering kinetic energy, you either focus it all creatures within 5 feet. Any creature targeted by this spell must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or be pushed 20 feet away from you. Targets are pushed 40 feet on a critical failure, knocked prone, and take 1d6 bludgeoning damage.
